mapper.insert: INSERT INTO expense(rdate, sort, expenseitem, file1, expensemoney, categoryno, mno) VALUES (#{rdate}, #{sort}, #{expenseitem}, #{file1}, #{expensemoney}, #{categoryno}, #{mno})
mapper.select: SELECT c.categoryno, c.categorysort, p.expenseno, p.rdate, p.sort, p.expenseitem, p.file1, p.expensemoney, p.categoryno, p.mno FROM category c, expense p WHERE c.categoryno = p.categoryno
